LanguageData.RemoveDevStageLimit.RestartRequired: WARNING: RESTART REQUIRED FOR ALL SETTINGS!!!
LanguageData.RemoveDevStageLimit.MakeAdultApparelUsab: Enable to make adult apparel usable by children.
LanguageData.RemoveDevStageLimit.MakeChildApparelUsab: Enable to make child apparel usable by adults.
LanguageData.RemoveDevStageLimit.Debug.Tooltip: Enable to print debug output to Player.log, including auto-patcher output.
LanguageData.RemoveDevStageLimit.IgnoreFilters: Configure which apparel to be ignored:
